Using this API, you can get the following: No Watermark Video Url With Watermark Video Url Music Mp3 Url, Music Title, Music Cover… Video Author, Video Title, Video Cover… Video Hashtags Video Duration, Video Share Url…

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://douyin-api-new.p.rapidapi.com/v1/social/douyin/app/hot/billboard_aweme"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "douyin-api-new.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
